Genetic engineering involves manipulating the genes of living organisms, which is a complex process with unpredictable outcomes. The scientific community is still grappling with understanding these processes fully. Therefore, it seems more prudent to focus on understanding these mechanisms thoroughly before moving forward with genetic engineering.
